resume:
Send money quickly,
easily and fast.

account.advantagesTitle: Just like real cash, but better.
account.businessAccountDetail: Jeton allows you to request payments for a good and services that you have provided. The Simple pricing makes this account efficient to your business, and easy to access for your customers.

payment.title: All Your Payment Methods in
payment.detail: Make payments and withdraw funds with a simple, quick and secure away which includes instant banking.
